description: Keep the machine readable intrinsic metadata information in a single source file, and automatically generate other file formats
Add software name and description of the software's functionality and purpose
Add descriptive metadata for classification purposes embedded in the code
Cite related resources (e.g journal articles) describing the software with a persistent identifier or stable URL
Add descriptive metadata of the software in a machine readable format
Add intrinsic metadata about authors, this information can be captured in a human readable format
